自然环境中的身体活动比其他运动更有好处自然环境中身体活动 (PANS) 的健康益处及其促进策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Physical-activity-in-natural-settings-offers-benefits-over-other-exercise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Physical-activity-in-natural-settings-offers-benefits-over-other-exercise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cba72c3-791c-4401-8850-a3b3fc9bbc58 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 04:39:00 -0400 Physical activity in natural settings offers benefits over other exercise
COVID-19 疫苗可减少孕妇的感染和并发症2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 疫苗的反应原性和对妊娠结局的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/COVID-19-vaccines-reduce-infection-and-complications-in-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/COVID-19-vaccines-reduce-infection-and-complications-in-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9da5ed3-cee4-473f-ad68-de623be22312 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 04:10:00 -0400 COVID-19 vaccines reduce infection and complications in pregnant women
开放获取图谱揭示了蛔虫衰老的分子机制一份新的衰老图谱让科学家们能够深入了解线虫中的单个细胞和组织如何衰老，以及不同的寿命延长策略如何使时钟停止。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Open-access-atlas-unveils-the-molecular-mechanisms-of-roundworm-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Open-access-atlas-unveils-the-molecular-mechanisms-of-roundworm-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=521865b2-52b3-4b37-8f18-276db7dbd77b Tue, 18 Jun 2024 02:17:27 -0400 Open-access atlas unveils the molecular mechanisms of roundworm aging
线粒体自噬促进癌症干细胞生长和存活一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 11 期封面上，题为“线粒体自噬与癌症：作用” BNIP3/BNIP3L 作为干性特征、ATP 产生、增殖和细胞迁移的能量驱动因素。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Mitophagy-fuels-cancer-stem-cell-growth-and-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Mitophagy-fuels-cancer-stem-cell-growth-and-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48f17531-eaf2-4301-ab62-d18b651adbf9 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 02:14:30 -0400 Mitophagy fuels cancer stem cell growth and survival
EULAR 更新 PRP 指南：加强患者参与风湿病研究近年来，人们越来越认识到 PRP 的好处。这一作用非常重要，远远超出了将患者纳入研究参与者的范畴。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/EULAR-updates-PRP-guidelines-Enhancing-病人-参与-in-rheumatic-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/EULAR-updates-PRP-guidelines-Enhancing-病人-参与-in-rheumatic-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3dd9648-f418-470f-bb30-93e468262f49 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 02:01:03 -0400 EULAR updates PRP guidelines: Enhancing patient involvement in rheumatic disease research
新研究探讨母亲对大脑生物标志物的影响麻省总医院布里格姆分校的研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，一个人是否从母亲或父亲那里遗传了患阿尔茨海默病的风险，会影响大脑中导致疾病的生物变化的风险。通过评估 4,400 名年龄在 65-85 岁之间、认知能力未受损的成年人，研究小组发现，那些母亲或父母双方都有阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 病史的人的大脑中淀粉样蛋白含量增加。他们的研究结果发表在《JAMA Neurology》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-research-explores-maternal-influence-on-brain-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-research-explores-maternal-influence-on-brain-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dd6a4db-c5f9-4307-bf51-c86c2e75db7d Tue, 18 Jun 2024 01:44:00 -0400 New research explores maternal influence on brain biomarkers
精确的蛋白质设计为受损的心脏和肾脏带来希望利用计算机设计的蛋白质，研究人员现已证明他们能够在实验室中引导人类干细胞形成新血管。再生医学的这一里程碑为修复受损的心脏、肾脏和其他器官提供了新的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Precise- Protein-design-offers-hope-for-damaging-hearts-and-kidneys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Precise- Protein-design-offers-hope-for-damaging-hearts-and-kidneys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e99b2536-9a6d-4c98-9583-d9e411a1ff12 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 01:31:00 -0400 Precise protein design offers hope for damaged hearts and kidneys
研究发现阿莫西林在治疗小儿肺炎方面优于青霉素 V最近的一项研究证实，与青霉素 V 相比​​，阿莫西林在治疗小儿肺炎方面治疗失败的风险较低，且严重并发症的发生率没有差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Amoxicillin-outperforms-penicillin-V-in-treating-pediatric-pneumonia-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Amoxicillin-outperforms-penicillin-V-in-treating-pediatric-pneumonia-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a7e90fc-b166-43d9-9eb1-2cf93b0e4892 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 01:29:00 -0400 Amoxicillin outperforms penicillin V in treating pediatric pneumonia, study finds
关于新冠病毒长期流行率和危险因素的新研究在大流行初期，许多感染 SARS-Cov-2 或 COVID-19 的人开始报告，即使在一个月或更长时间后，他们也无法摆脱症状——异常渴望上呼吸道病毒感染-；或在感染清除后不久出现新的持续症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-research-on-long-COVID-prevalence-and-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-research-on-long-COVID-prevalence-and-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb86a622-2e3f-4a95-8971-4afbb241c0a3 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 01:28:00 -0400 New research on long COVID prevalence and risk factors
